entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
